title: US sanctions 2 Indians for 'ties' to Houthis transporting Iranian oil
content: The US has sanctioned 18 entities, including two individuals of Indian descent, for their involvement with a Houthi network transporting Iranian oil. This network funds Houthi attacks on Israel and disrupts shipping in the Red Sea. The companies involved are linked to the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps-Quds Force.
summary: The US has sanctioned 18 entities, including two individuals of Indian descent, for their involvement with a Houthi network transporting Iranian oil. This network funds Houthi attacks on Israel and disrupts shipping in the Red Sea. The companies involved are linked to the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps-Quds Force.

title: North Korea claims it discovered the remains of a South Korean drone in its capital
content: North Korea claimed to discover a South Korean drone in Pyongyang, alleging it was proof of South Korean military infiltrations and propaganda activities. South Korea dismissed the claim as unilateral and unworthy of a response. Rising tensions between the nations include North Korea's threats of retaliation and ongoing psychological warfare tactics.
summary: North Korea claimed to discover a South Korean drone in Pyongyang, alleging it was proof of South Korean military infiltrations and propaganda activities. South Korea dismissed the claim as unilateral and unworthy of a response. Rising tensions between the nations include North Korea's threats of retaliation and ongoing psychological warfare tactics.

title: ‘4 more ministers of Trudeau cabinet planning departures’
content: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau is planning a cabinet shuffle as several ministers, including Carla Qualtrough and MarieClaude Bibeau, decide not to run in the next election. This move comes amid growing discontent over the Liberal Party’s slump in the polls and pressure to compete with Conservative leader Pierre Poilievre.
summary: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau is planning a cabinet shuffle as several ministers, including Carla Qualtrough and MarieClaude Bibeau, decide not to run in the next election. This move comes amid growing discontent over the Liberal Party’s slump in the polls and pressure to compete with Conservative leader Pierre Poilievre.

title: Elon Musk's SpaceX successfully launches 20 Starlink satellites
content: SpaceX successfully launched a Falcon 9 rocket carrying 20 Starlink satellites, including 13 with Direct to Cell capabilities, from Cape Canaveral. The first-stage booster returned to Earth, landing on the drone ship 'Just Read the Instructions'. This launch marks the 17th mission for the booster, supporting various missions including OneWeb 2 and Intelsat 40e.
summary: SpaceX successfully launched a Falcon 9 rocket carrying 20 Starlink satellites, including 13 with Direct to Cell capabilities, from Cape Canaveral. The first-stage booster returned to Earth, landing on the drone ship 'Just Read the Instructions'. This launch marks the 17th mission for the booster, supporting various missions including OneWeb 2 and Intelsat 40e.

title: US elections: Kamala Harris questions Trump's physical stamina; former President hits back
content: Kamala Harris expressed concerns about 78-year-old Donald Trump's physical ability to serve as president, questioning his stamina. In response, Trump denied fatigue claims and emphasized his poll strength. Harris also criticized Trump's portrayal of the January 6 Capitol attack. Both candidates are actively campaigning in Michigan, a critical battleground state, with polls showing a tight race.
summary: Kamala Harris expressed concerns about 78-year-old Donald Trump's physical ability to serve as president, questioning his stamina. In response, Trump denied fatigue claims and emphasized his poll strength. Harris also criticized Trump's portrayal of the January 6 Capitol attack. Both candidates are actively campaigning in Michigan, a critical battleground state, with polls showing a tight race.

title: Bangladesh interim government says polls possible in 2025
content: Bangladesh's interim government anticipates that parliamentary elections could realistically happen next year after forming a new election commission and finalizing an updated voter list. However, there are ongoing legal actions against top Awami League leaders, including Sheikh Hasina, which could impact their participation.
summary: Bangladesh's interim government anticipates that parliamentary elections could realistically happen next year after forming a new election commission and finalizing an updated voter list. However, there are ongoing legal actions against top Awami League leaders, including Sheikh Hasina, which could impact their participation.

title: Watch: Trump faces mic malfunction in Detroit rally, says he won't pay for 'stupid company'
content: Donald Trump’s rally in Detroit was plagued by technical issues when his microphone cut out, leaving him waiting for nearly 20 minutes. Amid chants of support from the crowd, Trump eventually resumed, taking a jab at the equipment provider.
summary: Donald Trump’s rally in Detroit was plagued by technical issues when his microphone cut out, leaving him waiting for nearly 20 minutes. Amid chants of support from the crowd, Trump eventually resumed, taking a jab at the equipment provider.

title: Oakland bushfire destroys homes, forces hundreds to evacuate as blaze spreads
content: A significant bushfire erupted in Oakland Hills near Interstate 580, consuming seven homes and covering 13 acres within hours. Authorities issued evacuation orders, directing residents to Burckhalter Elementary School. No injuries were reported as 120 firefighters and aircraft worked to control the blaze amid red flag warnings and diablo winds. The fire's cause is still unknown.
summary: A significant bushfire erupted in Oakland Hills near Interstate 580, consuming seven homes and covering 13 acres within hours. Authorities issued evacuation orders, directing residents to Burckhalter Elementary School. No injuries were reported as 120 firefighters and aircraft worked to control the blaze amid red flag warnings and diablo winds. The fire's cause is still unknown.

title: US Republicans accuse Britain of foreign interference after Labour sends 100 staff to campaign for Harris
content: US Republicans accuse Britain's Labour Party of foreign election interference after members went to the US to campaign for Kamala Harris. Controversy arose when a LinkedIn post revealed nearly 100 Labour staffers participating, prompting legal and political backlash. Involvement is personal, not Labour-organized.
summary: US Republicans accuse Britain's Labour Party of foreign election interference after members went to the US to campaign for Kamala Harris. Controversy arose when a LinkedIn post revealed nearly 100 Labour staffers participating, prompting legal and political backlash. Involvement is personal, not Labour-organized.

title: Trump says he was 'amazed that Harvey Weinstein got scholnged'
content: Donald Trump, during an interview on the Dan Bongino Show, discussed how he was surprised Harvey Weinstein faced severe punishment despite being backed by Democrats. Trump referred to Weinstein as the 'king of the woke' and said Democrats typically protect their own. “But boy — you don’t know him well, I don’t know him well, but I watched that and it was amazing. So when they do get hit, they get hit. But that’s the only one I can think of, normally they protect everybody,” he continued. “What they did was Adams, I think, is very suspect.”
summary: Donald Trump, during an interview on the Dan Bongino Show, discussed how he was surprised Harvey Weinstein faced severe punishment despite being backed by Democrats. Trump referred to Weinstein as the 'king of the woke' and said Democrats typically protect their own. “But boy — you don’t know him well, I don’t know him well, but I watched that and it was amazing. So when they do get hit, they get hit. But that’s the only one I can think of, normally they protect everybody,” he continued. “What they did was Adams, I think, is very suspect.”

title: Are Meghan and Harry buying a house in Portugal? King Charles has a message
content: Royal experts are also aware that Harry and Meghan are buying a house in Portugal and they believe that King Charles' message to them would be of indifference. King Charles is not going to "concern himself" with the news, experts claimed. King Charles evicted them from their Windsor property after they left the family and defamed the family in the public but the King will not be perturbed by the news.
summary: Royal experts are also aware that Harry and Meghan are buying a house in Portugal and they believe that King Charles' message to them would be of indifference. King Charles is not going to "concern himself" with the news, experts claimed. King Charles evicted them from their Windsor property after they left the family and defamed the family in the public but the King will not be perturbed by the news.

title: Surprise battlefield encounter led to Sinwar's death, say Israelis
content: Israeli soldiers on a routine patrol in Gaza encountered Yahya Sinwar, the Hamas chief, and killed him alongside two militants in a firefight. Sinwar had been elusive since October 2023, but his identity was confirmed through dental records, fingerprints, and DNA testing.
summary: Israeli soldiers on a routine patrol in Gaza encountered Yahya Sinwar, the Hamas chief, and killed him alongside two militants in a firefight. Sinwar had been elusive since October 2023, but his identity was confirmed through dental records, fingerprints, and DNA testing.

title: 'It's the First Amendment, stupid ...' Federal judge slams DeSantis administration for threats against TV stations
content: A federal court has ordered Florida Governor Ron DeSantis to halt threats against broadcasters airing a pro-abortion rights ad. The state's health department labeled the ad as "false," prompting stations to cease airing it. The court ruled such actions as unconstitutional and anti-First Amendment, granting a temporary restraining order.
summary: A federal court has ordered Florida Governor Ron DeSantis to halt threats against broadcasters airing a pro-abortion rights ad. The state's health department labeled the ad as "false," prompting stations to cease airing it. The court ruled such actions as unconstitutional and anti-First Amendment, granting a temporary restraining order.

title: Israel & its Iran-aligned foes vow war will go on
content: Israel, Hamas, and Hezbollah vow to continue their conflicts following the death of Hamas chief Yahya Sinwar. Israeli PM Netanyahu sees Sinwar's killing as a milestone but states the war is not over. US President Biden calls for peace efforts, though challenges remain.
summary: Israel, Hamas, and Hezbollah vow to continue their conflicts following the death of Hamas chief Yahya Sinwar. Israeli PM Netanyahu sees Sinwar's killing as a milestone but states the war is not over. US President Biden calls for peace efforts, though challenges remain.

title: Who is Ashwin Ramaswami, first Gen-Z Indian-American candidate to run for US state legislature
content: Ashwin Ramaswami, a young Democrat from Johns Creek, is challenging the incumbent state senator, who was indicted alongside former President Trump for alleged interference in Georgia's 2020 election. Ramaswami emphasizes law and order, has raised significant campaign funds, and focuses on healthcare and housing issues. He aims to prove the Democrats' stance on election integrity.
summary: Ashwin Ramaswami, a young Democrat from Johns Creek, is challenging the incumbent state senator, who was indicted alongside former President Trump for alleged interference in Georgia's 2020 election. Ramaswami emphasizes law and order, has raised significant campaign funds, and focuses on healthcare and housing issues. He aims to prove the Democrats' stance on election integrity.

title: 'Overweight...never smoker': 5 things to know about Donald Trump's health
content: ​Donald Trump is 6 feet 3 inches tall, according to records. His weight is 244 pounds (110 kg). He is medically obese. However, there are many records of Trump's height and weight. He self-reported his weight as 215 pounds (97.5 kg) in 2020. Another record from 2018 said his weight was 239 pounds (108 kg).
summary: ​Donald Trump is 6 feet 3 inches tall, according to records. His weight is 244 pounds (110 kg). He is medically obese. However, there are many records of Trump's height and weight. He self-reported his weight as 215 pounds (97.5 kg) in 2020. Another record from 2018 said his weight was 239 pounds (108 kg).

title: Doug Emhoff, Tim Walz take rapid fire from children; reveal favorite food, music
content: Kamala Harris's husband, Doug Emhoff, and Democrat nominee Tim Walz shared a light moment with their children in an Arizona cafe. They discussed their favorite music and food, mentioning artists like Springsteen and REM. They enjoyed cinnamon buns and urged everyone to participate in the elections, emphasizing the importance of voting.
summary: Kamala Harris's husband, Doug Emhoff, and Democrat nominee Tim Walz shared a light moment with their children in an Arizona cafe. They discussed their favorite music and food, mentioning artists like Springsteen and REM. They enjoyed cinnamon buns and urged everyone to participate in the elections, emphasizing the importance of voting.

title: Centuries old copy of US Constitution sells for $9 million at North Carolina auction
content: A rare 237-year-old copy of the US Constitution was sold for $9 million at a private auction by Brunk Auctions in North Carolina. This copy, discovered in Edenton, North Carolina, is one of only eight known to exist today. Accompanied by a letter from George Washington, it highlights the historical significance of the document.
summary: A rare 237-year-old copy of the US Constitution was sold for $9 million at a private auction by Brunk Auctions in North Carolina. This copy, discovered in Edenton, North Carolina, is one of only eight known to exist today. Accompanied by a letter from George Washington, it highlights the historical significance of the document.

title: Donald Trump earned money from overcharging Secret Service through Washington hotel, says report
content: House Democrats claim former President Trump charged exorbitant rates to the Secret Service for rooms at his hotel during his presidency, reportedly profiting from taxpayer funds and breaching the Domestic Emoluments Clause by accepting these payments. Evidence includes billing records revealing significant markups on room rates compared to standard prices.
summary: House Democrats claim former President Trump charged exorbitant rates to the Secret Service for rooms at his hotel during his presidency, reportedly profiting from taxpayer funds and breaching the Domestic Emoluments Clause by accepting these payments. Evidence includes billing records revealing significant markups on room rates compared to standard prices.

title: Unverified Reddit post claiming Kamala Harris said 'Oh my God, it's over' going viral
content: An unverified Reddit post claiming that Kamala Harris said 'Oh my God, it's over' -- after her Fox News interview -- went viral, though there is no confirmation about it and social media users claimed that it's possible that it's fake. The post writer claimed to be a friend of a person who was in the camera crew for the said interview and Kamala Harris was struggling.
summary: An unverified Reddit post claiming that Kamala Harris said 'Oh my God, it's over' -- after her Fox News interview -- went viral, though there is no confirmation about it and social media users claimed that it's possible that it's fake. The post writer claimed to be a friend of a person who was in the camera crew for the said interview and Kamala Harris was struggling.
